fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Incinerate someone at night. If this is the first ability targetting them that has resolved in the game and they are evil, they will be dealt an Unstoppable attack. You may only do this once.
- Light someone ablaze each night. Players who are lit ablaze will have every other ability targetting them be turned into a Basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your abilities both have the highest possible priority.
